content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside with my husband and i was watching the sky because i had a weird feeling and when i stood up to go inside there all of a sudden from above the tree was this huge bright light that took off extremely fast and just disappeared. no sound or anything. every night some time while we're sleeping our power goes out.
content.summary: Fast bright big light took off over our heads

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting by my pool watching a big cumulus cloud. a black dot came from the left and at first i thought it was a bird but it was just a round dot, it had no wings.  it kept flying fast and on a steady arc through the sky.  it was below the clouds, but the clouds were high in the sky, so i figure it was at least 5000 feet up.  it seemed like it would be about a third of the size of a regular airplane.  it all happened in about 30 seconds and went across most of the sky in that time so it was faster than an airplane.  as i was watching it it took me about 20 seconds to realize i could not explain what it was.  i sat up on the edge of my chair so that i could continue to watch it.  when it disappeared into some light cirrus clouds in the east i thought, where are the binoculars when you need them?!  my feeling was, really?  was that a ufo?  like a small personal craft or something?   at the rate it was going it would have been to the jersey shore in another couple of minutes and to europe in an hour or two.  i am just curious and found your sight because i was looking on google to see if a ufo could look like what i saw, ie. no lights, just a small sphere in broad daylight.  my husband said maybe it was a satellite, but it was below the high clouds!
content.summary: I was sitting by my pool watching a big cumulus cloud. a black dot came from the left and at first i thought it was a bird but it was just a round dot, it had no wings

content.detailedDescription:
i was recording a video of a thunderstorm that was passing south of my home. i left the camera outside for a 20 minute recording on a tripod while i returned inside of my home. i didn't realize that an object was recorded until after i reviewed the video clip on my computer. it appeared around 5 minutes and 20 seconds into the recording. after almost 3 minutes, it faded away.

   i can supply you with the original video clip but the size is 658 mb. it's an avi clip, frame size 640x480 at 30 fps with a data rate of 14,780 kbps. i created an mpeg2 (mpg) file of the relevant 3 minutes at file size of 19.5 mb using pinnacle studio 11 video editor that i included as an attachment. i also included 4 frame grab images from my video editor.

sincerely,

ralph buskey
mufon field investigator
content.summary: Morphing and pulsating colorful light object

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were in my room watching tv when we heard a loud roar outside. we ran to the window. it was a cop tat was out at my neighbors house. as my mom was preoccupied watching that go down, i noticed a light in the sky. i watched it, and it was just a plane, but i filmed it anyway since it seemed to be government, or at least non commercial. i walked outside and watched it fly away. about a few minutes later i saw a similar object to the ufo i saw on 07/14/13 in novato. the sighting began at 10:04 pm.

i started filming it asap. it was orange colored, and there were multiple lights. all were behaving differently. one large, bright one on the bottom and about 2 on the top. the bottom one was constant, the top ones were blinking/"dancing". it hovered in place for a little bit and then slowly drifted south/southwest. it was very low to the ground just nearby the indian tree preserve mountains. i filmed it until it disappeared around 10:06 pm, just after my camera ran out of film!

the ufo is moving from right to left in the footage. i am standing in my backyard, facing the indian tree preserve. the flight path of the ufo was from the vicinity of the indian tree preserve to josef hoog park.

when i uploaded the footage to my computer and enhanced it, i could see the large lower light, a faded light on the left that was constant, and 3 - 4 smaller lights on the top blinking and "dancing"
(a total of about 5 - 6 lights)

it was cold outside. very quiet. there was barely even a breeze. during the sighting i heard no noise. nothing.

in the enhanced video, you can see the indian tree preserve mountains horizon. below it, in the valley, is where the ufo was hovering.

in the enhanced video, you can see two faint lights on the right floating towards each other. as i properly set up my cameras options and tilt it towards the sky, and back down again, you will notice that the lights have converged together. they are now acting as one unit! some are dancing with each other, some are just floating with the rest.

note. i repeat. if you watch the video closely, especially the enhanced version, two dim lights are seen in the beginning of the video on the right. they move closer to each other. then i moved the camera up and back down. by this time the lights were in a cluster and there were more than 2.

the enhanced footage starts with the object cropped and zoomed, then replays the video un-cropped/zoomed. it is easier to see this event happening in the un-cropped/un-zoomed portion of the video.

in conclusion, the objects appeared and converged, then hovered in place, then proceeded to slowly move south.

there is also a blinking light in the sky in the beginning of the video above the horizon. i didn't watch this object. it probably was just a plane anyway. i listed that there was a plane in the vicinity of the sighting, though the blinking light that i saw was much further away from the craft i witnessed and i do not think it had anything to do with what i saw. minutes later, a government airplane flew by the area.

the footage was shot handheld on a panasonic ag-dvx100b

attached is the flight path, original untouched video, and the enhanced video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange hovering lights dancing with each other low to the ground

content.detailedDescription: Many ufos here in portugal. for the last weeks i've seen almost everyday maybe 4 times a week, from 9 pm to 6 am, many balls or orbs of light going in many directions, flying in a staright line and while flying they disappear and then appear or turn the light on and they are much farther away but in the same direction and path, then they are heading in a directions, suddenly they turn off or disappear from nothing they appear again flying in the opposite direction. when we see them they are heading in a normal speed then they like progressively turn the light off the light loses its brightness and they keep flying till they disapear completely, when they get very bright, it seems like they are going to explode they seem to get bigger as the light gets more strong and it is very beatiful looks like a flash in the sky. pretty weird, the fact that they appear to get bigger and seem they are going to explode qhen they get brighter.
content.summary: Balls of light, like orbs going in many directions, changing path rapidly. they would appear, turn light off whlie flying and then appear in the same path much farther away.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving home and as we were driving i looked out the passenger window and saw what looked to be fireworks glowing in the air. as i continued to watch the lights stayed in they sky. i told my boyfriend to look and he saw the same lights; therewere about 12-15 of them. when we continued to watch them hover over the city they began to sprea out, changing their big dipper like formation. they were glowing and changing color from a white to a red-orange. after about 2 minutes we arrived at home, got out of the car and ran to look at the sky again. when we could see them many  had disseapared however, there were about six left. behind them was a helicopter that had its search light shining straight at them. then all of the lights were disappearing one after another rapidly. all that was left in the sky was the helicopter with its search light still shining. we had no idea what we were looking at but it was like nothing we have seen before. neither of us believe in "aliens" but we can't think of any kind of explanation for what we saw.
content.summary: Hovering in a big dipper like pattern then began to change direction spreading further apart

content.detailedDescription: Sitting out on deck overlooking lake about 10pm, saw a very bright star like object eratically fly over lake very quickly, it seemed to disappear into trees in distant hills.  however it came back a few second later and appeared to start circling the lake, some times it seemed to hover behind trees. after a few minutes there were three or four more that appeared and flew over the lake in about five seconds.  the lake is a mile long and half a mile wide.  they were darting all over the sky.  when seen flying over the lake they seemed star like, when hovering over the trees they seemed much smaller, like small orbs.  they were not planes, meteors, or fireworks.  they made no noise.  after about half an hour they disappeared.  it was wonderful and mind boggling.
content.summary: Many star like objects flying over lake at night at very high speeds, erratic patterns, sometimes hovering behind trees.

content.detailedDescription:
Location of sighting: over lake michigan, beachfront, and marquette park lagoon, miller beach, in.

weather: 85, very cloudy, no stars.

surrounding activities: a wedding reception/celebration occurring in the marquette park aquatorium building, which included several witnesses of same sighting.

my sighting details: nine starlike objects ascending one after the other, in quick succession, one behind the other, from a lower altitude, into a higher altitude,yet, still below the clouds, in plain view. speed unknown. after this projection was complete, they hoovered around together in the sky, for about a minute. then, they gradually, began to form a loose, not tightly clustered, vertical line formation, in the sky. after this vertical line formation, they slowly began to separate, and began to form a horizontal line, and travel toward me, and went over my house,at about the speed of an airplane. also, i remember, at this same time, i heard some people in the distance, shouting in surprise. i assumed that they were witnessing this sighting also. when they passed over my house, in a horizontal formation, i counted the nine starlike objects again, and saw them heading toward downtown gary, indiana. i watched the nine,until i could'nt see them, because of the distance. after the sighting,i called 911, and i rode my bike to the aquatorium to find other people who would be witnesses. the security guard was there guarding the gate, but told me he saw the same sighting i saw, in similar detail, but he thought they were stars. i wish someone in your organization would get to the bottom of this, and interview some folks who were at that wedding, and see if this sighting of nine objects, showed up on local radar screens. thank-you
content.summary: First seen as 9 starlike objects ascending into an arc, gradually forming a vertical line, then horzontal line

content.detailedDescription:
During a storm photo shooting an object passed very fast in front of the camera. i just saw it before when downloading the pics.
i also shot some misterious double smoke tail objecton march 12th 2012, i 'm also ataching some pics. thanks.
content.summary: During a storm photo shooting an object passed very fast in front of the camera. i just saw it before

content.detailedDescription: Eating dinner facing east on 24th floor of building facing downtown dallas. my friend and i witnessed an odd shaped object hovering over downtown. we got up and went to the window and then onto the balcony to get better look. it was unlike anything we've even seen. it went in a curved direction toward the southwest and passed over our building.
content.summary: Ufo over downtown dallas

content.detailedDescription: It was dec 7 2012 we were watching a river boat parade they have every year, i am fortunate enough to view it from my back yard. it was my fianc���, my two nephews 10 and 7 and my niece 9. i went back in to the house to get a soda because all the boats just went by, they go down the river and turn around and came back. as i just walked in i hear my fianc���, niece and nephews yelling for me to come out! i go running out and look up where they're pointing and i see 5 pulsating orbs taking a circular formation they held that pattern but they were blinking and pulsating across from each other after about 5 to ten minutes they faded. about ten minutes after that i had company show up, i told them all what i saw n they were like, yeah right, ok! it was my good friend joe his son and daughter 9  and 7 and his girlfriend sierra. they came with one of there friends   casey n his son mason age 9.Casey has a big truck so we all get in my nephews and niece included. my nephew ryan little joe and i get in the back of the truck. as we start heading down cortez blvd. east towards u.S.19 we see these fire balls start lighting n pulsating some are flying up some flying down but they all were making a straight line. i banged on the roof n got everybody's attention to look at it. they saw it but i think casey was afraid to stop! i don't even feel like telling this next part, but the whole time both these incidents were happening it all felt so connected like deja vu almost, i know it sounds crazy let me explain! in 1986 not far from here in a town called hudson, my mother, brother and i were going home around 930 pm the whole ride home it looked like a star was following us, i kept telling my mom and she kept blowing it off, my brother ann i saw it getting bigger the closer we got home. i remember us making a left down gulf way dr. and then we couldn't see it no more. all of a sudden there is this bright  dull red light it just engulfed the car my mom slammed on the brakes i cant remember how long the light was in the car but it seemed like forever then i remember seeing this red fireball go into the woods on  that road and i remember the light going thru the trees, it wasn't like light. then i remember running in the house with my brother and hiding by the couch and  the all the electricity in the neighborhood started like draining and dimming but not going completely out. my mom acknowledges that whole incident she just don't like talking about it. just when i witnessed those two incidents in just like resonated in my soul and brought me back to that moment as a child! i have witnesses! thank you for listening!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 other people n i witnessed 5 orbs taking formation in back yard then friends came over we left n were going over to their house it was 9 witnesses n myself who saw 10 of them takiing formation n pulsating on n off

content.summary: 4 other people n i witnessed 5 orbs taking formation in back yard then friends came over we left n were going over to their house it was 9 witnesses n myself who saw 10 of them takiing formation n pulsating on n off

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 3:30 in the morning i went out into my backyard to smoke, i glanced to the west and noticed what appeared to be an usually bright "star" in the sky to the west. i found it to be strange, i own a telescope and keep track on when planets will be visible so i can go out for a viewing, so i knew that there shouldn't be any planets, especially as bright as what i saw, in the position that it was in.

i'm not sure how long it was visible prior to me going outside and noticing it, but it remained visible for roughly 20-30 seconds as i was observing it. during that time it was completely motionless staying in the exact same spot when suddenly it made this upward movement and within 2 seconds the object/light just faded away.

during when it was visible there were no sounds at all that could be heard and the light wasn't blinking, it was just a solid steady whitish light. when i got back in, i pulled up ir satellite to see if there were clouds in the sky and maybe the light faded due to going behind clouds but there were no clouds in the area. perfectly clear night.

i am left with no explanation as to what i saw, or why it was there in the sky. in my 32 years of being alive, i have never witnessed anything unusual in the sky.
content.summary: Bright light observed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the east bound lanes of i-70 during a construction closure for replacement of pecos st bridge around 4 am. i was scanning the sky getting ready to fire up google sky map on my phone when i noticed this point of light moving in a ne direction towards dia. my boss was with me and we watched it travel across the sky, i mentioned the lack of any flashing lights like you would see on an airplane wondering if i was just seeing airplane landing lights. the object was traveling slow and steady and i followed it until it was low on the horizon and blocked by buildings and trees. i studied it intensely to be sure it was not an airplane because this could be the third ufo i have seen in my lifetime.
content.summary: Slow and steady point of light no strobe lights observed like an airplane would have

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were on a hike on a popular trail in auburn, california, when we decided to stop and rest about a mile down the trail. there is a rock that protrudes from the mountainside that overlooks most of the canyon and river below that is ideal for photographs and provides a large vantage point of the surrounding mountains. we were all taking turns doing yoga at this vantage point and taking pictures with an iphone 4, and reviewing them immediately after. upon reviewing the clarity of several of the photos that were taken seconds apart, we noticed an unusual object in the sky in one of the photos that did not appear in the pictures taken seconds before and after. the object appears to be a diamond shape with two narrow appendages protruding from the bottom and has a metallic appearance due to the reflection of the sun. we all climbed as high as we could to see if the object could still be seen with no such luck. there was very little breeze and we saw no further aircraft or any kind of balloon for the duration of the hike. if we had not captured the object in that very brief moment, we would have most likely never seen the object as it made no noticeable sound, left no apparent trail in the sky on a nearly cloudless day, and it disappeared from sight immediately. we are not sure what the object is, but it appears to be large in size due to the focus in the foreground vs the slight blur of the object over the horizon line.
content.summary: Object seen on steven's trail in auburn, ca

content.detailedDescription: I had my dogs outside in the yard . it was after 11 pm but before midnight. i looked up to see what i thought was a very large beautiful full moon in the west.  i made a mental note that i should go outside on my upstairs deck later before i went to bed to enjoy its beauty again. when i glanced back up a few seconds later, it had totally disappeared! i was astonished, but figured at the time the clouds must have moved in very quickly. when i came inside, the image of what i had seen (still assuming it was the full moon) was so vivid that i wrote in my almanac that the july 15 full moon was perfectly centered in my viewing field in the west that evening.  the next night, i noticed that not only was the "real" moon not completely full but it was still in the south in the sky that time of night!  i am somewhat troubled in retrospect...Also interesting is the fact that i had felt i needed to make note of it.
content.summary: Looked like the full moon

content.detailedDescription:
The first night me and my wife were on my fathers patio and i noticed a bright light appear to the north and descend quickly and the light faded. i assumed a plane had went behind clouds, problem is the object was descending away from us with white lights and i never could actually locate any cloudcover. this was at roughly 10 pm on the 18th of july. strange object seen the next night also around 10 pm with a north to south path, extremely high altitude with single light bright to dim until it just faded out completely. this night, night of the 21st at approximately 10 pm, bright light appears to the west, quite large and bright. appeared to be slightly wobbling around while very slowly descending and dimming. strange note: this was over a lake with a perfect reflection at first and the reflection disappeared even though it was not near tree cover yet, visually it was about one inch above the treeline, no reason to lose reflection. sometimes the object seemed to consist of three lights once it started to dim with shades of red and a slight blue.  all three events were at the same location, different sky locations, all at 10pm, all a bright light which dims and fades away and all completely noise-less.

any questions please email
content.summary: White with blues and reds starlike 4x larger very bright then fades

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i was driving home from nelsonville on 33. we were about a half mile southeast of the 328 exit when we saw it streak across the sky and go in behind some hills.It was cigar shaped with several lights along the side of it flying extremely low, under 200 feet id say. i looked at my girlfriend who was shaking with fear and asked her if i really saw what i thought i saw and she said yes. this was the second time in two weeks we have seen a strange object in the sky. the first was before the 4th of july fireworks. i'm quite familiar with aircraft and this wasn't any airplane i've ever seen and moved way too fast to be a blimp.
content.summary: The body of the object looked like it was reflecting light but it had several lights around it.

content.detailedDescription: I am ridnig my bike there i stop in the middle of the road i see a objest disc like looks like a penny hovering and the it take a path it had a pink color above the sky and it was during the day i saw another closer i could see more clearly it zoomed by at the same speed not sowing down and not speeding i thought it was a jet but no smoke or fire and jets dont go that fast and i lost the sight of it when it zoomed super fast like i saw it and it went as fast as light i saw it and it zoomed and it was gone.
content.summary: It was a scary experience i am only 13 also

content.detailedDescription:
I was in yosemite valley on april 24th 2013, scouting a location for photos of the "moonbow" at yosemite falls. standing along southside drive just west of the chapel looking roughly north towards upper yosemite falls. 

at about 9pm (9:04 on the camera time stamp), myself and another person who was out for the same reason noticed a very bright spot of white light coming over the ridge just left (west) of yosemite falls. it was considerably larger than the stars as well as the airplanes that are frequently visible in the area. we got the impression that it was moving very fast, relative to what we assumed were commercial airliners in the distance.

we could not make out a shape other than the round spot of light. it did not blink, pulse or change intensity, it remained constant except as it passed through or above the clouds. it was not below the clouds, other than that, we had no idea how high it might be.

it seemed to change course very slightly a couple of times before we lost sight of it crossing over the ridge to the south of us. total viewing time was probably about 1 minute. it did not appear to be making any sound or leaving any kind of a trail. 

i have seen many meteors, a comet, satellites in the night sky, lots of airplanes and some missile launches during the day and night. this object did not resemble any of those things in any lighting conditions i have observed.

i was planing on taking photos of the night landscape using a wide lens and long exposure. there was no time to switch lenses and settings so i just used what was already set and got a single 20 second exposure just before losing sight of the object. although the shutter was open for 20 seconds, the object went out of view about 5 seconds before the shutter closed. 

the ridge top and trees are at the bottom of the photo, looking roughly south. i did not take time to let the vibrations settle before opening the shutter, resulting in some blur and the squiggly stars. the object seems to suddenly appear at about center of the original photo, this is the point where the shutter opened.

i also attached a cropped photo for a closer look at the objects path and a photo of yosemite falls showing the clouds and stars present just a minute later, looking towards the north. the object first came into view over the ridge near the left edge of this photo.
content.summary: April 24th 2013 apx. 9pm. unusually bright light crossing yosemite valley roughly north to south, in or above cloud level. appearance and location very different from clearly marked airplanes in the area.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 9:40pm my husband and i were driving north on rt. 21 off 585 outside orriville and norton in summit county. thru the sunroof we saw something hovering above just over the tree line. it had a formation of the big dipper...4 lights in sort of a square and then 3 in a sort of handle like the big dipper. behind this were 6 or 7 lights in a straight line. the lights were orange. not fire, not glowing...Just orange lights in a perfectly square form. it hovered as we kept driving and as we moved on we could see it going south in a straight light. i have never seen anything like this. i do not believe in aliens etc..But i know what i saw. it was real whatever it was. there was no sound that we could hear. there was no other cars for miles on the road. it was dark, no street lights. on google image...I have seen photos that look almost exactly like what i saw.
content.summary: Something large with approx 14 orange lights in square pattern hovered over our car as we drove north on rt. 21 towards cleveland

content.detailedDescription: On saturday 07/20/13 approximately 22:10, i walked in my bedroom for a moment, and through my window which faces west, a very bright light caught my eye! i was surprised by this light in the sky and immediately knew this was something different from an aircraft or an astronomical object!!!! i went into my living room to view the object from my 2 windows that also face west. the light was a golden-yellow with a slightly golden light orange color to it. it was brighter than a star or planet would be seen by the unaided eye, and it was larger than a star or planet would appear on the horizon. it was also brighter than an aircraft with its landing lights turned on (am familiar with image of aircraft with landing lights.), and the object was larger than an airplane. again verifying from my view of the bright object from my living room windows this was something out of the ordinary, i quickly went to my utility room to get my schmidt-cassegrain 6 inch aperture (152 mm aperture, 1500 focal length) telescope. i positioned my telescope on my balcony, which faces west, and located the object within my finderscope. through a 25 mm eyepiece, i looked into my telescope, and because i was expecting to see a very bright light, at first i did not realize that i was actually viewing a craft through my telescope! then, i realized that i was viewing the outline of a disc-shaped structure!!!! it was absolutely amazing!!!!! i was completely astounded!!!!-i have never seen anything like this in my entire life!!!! as i mentioned, the craft was disc-shaped-it was a dull silver metallic color. i saw 3 or 4 "fan-shaped"-for lack of a better descriptive word-(they were not quite round and not quite triangular) lights emitting light; i also saw a circular-shaped light emitting light from the craft. the intriguing characteristic of the object i was viewing in my telescope, was that the light emitted from the craft reduced  the visibility of the disc-shaped vehicle, like a cloak to disguise (camouflage) the craft!!!! (this is why i did not realize i was already viewing the craft initially!) my dad is retired military, so i am familiar with various military aircraft, and this object that i was viewing was nothing like i had ever seen before!!!! unless the military is now having aerial vehicles manufactured that replicate the classic description of a disc-shaped spacecraft, i would state that this was an extraterrestrial aerial vehicle!!!! i also viewed this disc through an 9 mm eyepiece, and a x 2 barlow lens giving a 4.5 mm magnification. the object was hovering for the majority of the time i viewed it, only moving slightly to the right, slightly down, then slightly to the left-i had to reposition my telescope due to this slight movement. i also tried to video tape the bright object with my cell as do not have a standard video camera, but could not successfully obtain an image. i got in my car to see the bright light at a closer proximity (going w-sw), but at a point some buildings obstructed my view and by the time i got to a clearing, the object was gone. this was about an hour of total viewing time. it is truly the most incredible thing i have ever seen in the physical world!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright light when viewed in telescope revealed dull metallic disc craft!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
1: helendale ca
2: streak in the sky
3: fighter aircraft
4: moved through the sky with contrails and then would dissolve, then would reappear higher in the sky and would then dissolve again.
5: being familiar with all matter of aircraft it was unusual.
6: it dissolved and was lost.
content.summary: An aircraft in the sky that would dissolve and reappear in a different part of the skr.

content.detailedDescription: i was walking my dog in my back yard around 9pm on july 20th. the sun was set but a little day light remained. i looked to the east to watch a lightning storm moving north from the south east. the sky above me was clear, i could see stars. the storm clouds were lighting up when i noticed five red balls of light flying in a 1,2,2 formation. i thought they were a formation of helicopters at first, but they made no noise. as they traveled under the front of the storm clouds from east, south east, i notices a sixth orb appear from behind my neighbors house flying higher then other five. i ran to my rear door to tell my girlfriend to come out. by the time she came out she could see the last two orbs before they went behind other neighbors house. the orbs were now travaling north. i ran out to the front of my house and could see the last orb, (the last orb looked a lot farther away from then they were before.)it went into a cloud and that was it. the orbs did not blink, they stayed solid red. very weird event.
content.summary: Five or six red orbs flying in formation under the front clouds of storm front

content.detailedDescription:
For approximately an hour we saw these bright lights(orbs) ascended a forested mountain and headed off in the south-easterly direction from the mountain peak, a few appeared to descend from the mountain peak and never did reappear from where we lost sight of them into the valley. they may have traversed the valley only to re-ascend later?

we were in the house looking out of the front windows.

the brightness and the lack of any happenstance ever visible on said forested mountain.

bonfires(campfires) until they ascended and flew away from said mountain.

round, brightly, pulsating red-orange lights.

felt eerie and unnatural, as well as, glad they did not approach our location.

they flew in a south-easterly direction until they seemingly just disappeared.
content.summary: Lights emanated from mid valley, ascended mountain and flew in air beyond mountain peak until they visually dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: I happened to look up and see three grey/silver triangles each at different altitudes but collectively together. they hovered completely still - fixed in place - not like kites at all in the wind - and were silent. i watched them for 3 minutes, amused because folks were walking around oblivious (ear buds on, tuned out). to me these definitely fit the description of the alleged manmade trb3 astra. it didn't occur to me to photograph them because i was enjoying the moment, thinking - so there it is, we have the technology. i started walking away and within a second i thought- damn that's a good shot! - they are just sitting there. i looked up and they were gone without a trace. it had only been a couple of seconds and they were nowhere in the sky. no sound either. this was a gorgeous clear day, blue skies. so it seemed to me to be pretty ballsy, but then again everyone was rushing around lost in their own world. i don't think people in the city tend to look up in the sky much.
content.summary: 3 triangles hovering still and silent on a clear day - pretty ballsy right over boston!

content.detailedDescription:
Initial sighting;  haubstadt, gibson county, indiana, july 12 2013, 9:20 pm.  walking to vehicle after dinner at local restaurant.  looking in western sky.  noticed 3 glowing red-orange lights, in triangular outline, stationary in western sky about 30 degrees above the horizon.  lights resembled glowing embers of spent fireworks, but did not have a significant change in size, color,intensity or apparent position.  lights were not "large" but were easily observable and appeared larger (maybe 3x)than "normal" stars.

two of the 3 lights appeared to be along a n-s horizontal line.  the third was below this "line" (perhaps 5 degrees) and was closer to the northern light than the southern light.

got in the vehicle and drove toward the lights...Approximately 1/2 mile. individual lights and overall triangular shape did not appear to change (or grow larger - suggesting it was some distance away).

at this point the "lower" light began to move "up" and "north" toward the northern light along the horizontal line.  as it approached near the "northern" light, both the "lower" and "northern" lights appeared to pulsate (like a fireworks ember going out) and both faded out to dark.  neither the "northern" or "southern" light appeared to move during this period.

perhaps 30 seconds afterwards, the "southern" light also faded out in a similar manner.  

another 30 to 60 seconds later, a "new" light (very similar to the original 3) appeared in the same area in the sky...Near where the original "northern" light was located.  it appeared to move relatively rapidly and steadily along a horizontal line from north to south.  in less than 5 seconds it also faded out to dark. 

subsequent, random observations over the next hour or so, resulted in no additional sightings or information.
content.summary: 3 red-orange "glowing" spots of llight in western sky.  triangular form. 1 moved to another. both faded out.  3rd faded shortly thereafter.  4th? appeared moving steadily from n to s. faded out within 60 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was camping, listing to a ham radio when i picked up strange static and noises on it. soon after the noises began i saw a strange object in the sky circling then making it way to a dried out lake bed where it descended to about 30 ft above the ground. it stayed there for about 10-15 min. it then took off straight into the sky. after it left i believe  i saw what looked like a large humanoid in the moonlight across the lake from me, staring at me before slinking off into the woods.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object hovered over dry lake bed for 10 min

content.detailedDescription: Looked out my window saw a very large white object go behind a tree. it stayed there. never saw it come out.
content.summary: Saw a very large white object go behind a tree.

content.detailedDescription: While almost to my house, i saw two orange\red lights in the sky. i told my wife and kids to see what it was. my wife said it was two helicopters. i told her, "then where is the red and blue flashing lights?" i decided to pull over in an open area and got out of the car to look up. both lights were pulsating and there was no sound or other flashing lights. these orbs were so high, they looked like they were as high as a satellite path. they were too big to be a satellite and i myself have seen the space station size in the sky. they were bigger. then at that time, both took different directions. from the southwest, one went northeast while the other went west. it was almost a clear night with a full moon. both then disappeared. i called the local police non-emergency phone line where they took my call and said "they will put it in there information."
content.summary: Unusual red \ orange lights in the sky that caught my attention.
